com.alejandro.ataleofheroes.actors

Class Actors

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
      • com.alejandro.ataleofheroes.actors.Actors

  • public class Actors
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
    This class creates the Actor that casts the main Character hitbox. But, mostly, this class allows the character to move generating the sprite actor. sprite -> The sprite of the character dimensions -> The dimensions of the character batch -> The batch of the sprite

      • Actors

        public Actors(java.lang.String texturePath,
              float x,
              float y,
              float posAlt,
              float posAnc)
        This function allows the program to create actors.
        Parameters:
        texturePath - -> the texture of the actor
        x - -> the 'x' position of the actor
        y - -> the 'y' position of the actor
        posAlt - -> the position in tiles in the X axis of the actor
        posAnc - -> the position in tiles in the Y axis of the actor
